messages.subject: New Shinsengumi books
messages.msgSnippet: For our Japanese reading members I found some upcoming books listed on Yesasia.com, have you guys heard anything about these books? There are no descriptions
messages.messageBody:
For our Japanese reading members I found some upcoming books listed on
Yesasia.com, have you guys heard anything about these books? There are
no descriptions on the website. You may have to cut and paste the url

http://us.yesasia.com/en/SrAllDept.aspx?section=books&code=j&version=all&did=9945&str=shinsengumi&x=0&y=0

--
Barbara Sheridan
http://www.barbarasheridan.net



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
